location/primary_location.json.comment: This file contains the main location of the user inferred by Facebook based on elements like the current city indicated on the user profile, the device's IP address used to connect to his Facebook account, or device localisation settings

entries.action_type: Facebook inferred the current main city you live in

location/primary_public_location.json.comment: This file contains the main public location of the user inferred by facebook based on elements like the current city indicated on the user profile, the device's IP address used to connect to his facebook account, or device localisation settings

entries.action_type: Facebook inferred the current main city you live in

activity_messages/group_interactions.jso.comment: Volume of comments and posts shared in specific Facebook groups

entries.action_type: Post or comment you have shared in a Facebook group

activity_messages/people_and_friends.jso.comment: Interactions of any type the user had with people on Facebook

entries.action_type: Interaction (of any type) you had with other people on Facebook

apps_and_websites_off_of_facebook/your_o.comment: Information that companies and organizations share with facebook about the user interactions with them, such as visits to their applications or websites

entries.action_type: Company that shared information with facebook about your activity on their website/application

ads_information/advertisers_using_your_a.comment: Advertisers who have added the user's name to an audience based on his information or his activity outside of Facebook. Advertisers can use or import a list of information that facebook compares to the user's profile to show or not show certain ads. The user can also be part of an audience based on their interactions with an advertiser's website, app or store.

entries.action_type: Advertiser who has added your name to an audience based on your information or your activity outside of Facebook

ads_information/advertisers_you've_inter.comment: Advertisers whose ads the user has recently seen or clicked on

entries.action_type: Advertisers whose ads you have recently seen or clicked on

other_logged_information/friend_peer_gro.comment: The stages in the lives of your friends on Facebook

entries.action_type: The current stage of life of your friends inferred by Facebook

other_logged_information/ads_interests.j.comment: Interest categories and other categories that Facebook associates with the user based on the information he provided on Facebook and his activity. Advertisers may reach the user based on the interest categories

entries.action_type: Interest categories that Facebook associates with you based on the information he provided on Facebook and your activity

your_topics/your_topics.json.comment: Areas of interest inferred by Facebook based on the user's activity

entries.action_type: Topic inferred by Facebook as an area of interest based on your activity

comments_and_reactions/comments.json.comment: Comments shared by the user on Facebook

entries.action_type: Comment you posted on Facebook

your_interactions_on_facebook/recently_v.comment: Content recently viewed by the user on Facebook (videos, posts, facebook profiles, off-facebook web pages, articles on facebook marketplace, ads)
